description: Jake Porter is going through his grandfather’s things and finds a mysteriously titled videotape. He pops it in and is stunned to find out his grandfather used to be a porn star! Long John Porter, aka Jacob Peterson, was a toned and lean stud packing a beautiful, uncut cock. In this feature, he starred opposite beefy and muscular Damien Stone, who took much joy in tonguing his ass and fucking his hole.
title: Family Business Part 1
